events.message: Customer reported a rear-end collision involving their car on a busy intersection, requesting immediate claim initiation.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing initial report details and keywords indicating vehicle collision.
A dedicated claims agent has been assigned to handle the accident claim and coordinate further processing steps.
The customer has received confirmation that their claim for the vehicle accident has been acknowledged and is under review.
Request sent to the customer for police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates to support the claim.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including accident photographs, police report, and repair estimates.
Claims investigation has commenced to verify accident details, assess damages, and determine liability.
Investigation team completed their review confirming accident circumstances and validating submitted evidence.
A settlement amount covering the repair costs and related expenses has been proposed to the policyholder.
The customer has responded positively to the proposed claim settlement and expressed satisfaction with the process.
Formal approval of the claim has been granted following acceptance of the settlement by the claimant.
Insurance payment for the approved claim was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account without delay.
The claim has been officially closed after successful settlement and payment issuance, case completed.
All claim case files and correspondence have been archived as per standard retention policies.
